casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lonnie Bernard DAVIS 382P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Lonnie Bernard Davis, for Davis, Lonnie Bernard. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of November 2017 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
